text:
I found Amazon to have the lowest prices on the large packs of the Starbucks VIA and am happy with the transaction.

I first picked up a 5-pack of the VIA at a local grocery store at a cost of almost $8 to see if I liked them. The Amazon price is much better and lets me have a quick cup of coffee at work in the afternoon when I'm running a little low on energy.

They make great coffee, quick.
